name: QFeverTestsForCoxiellaBurnetiiByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Q Fever (Tests for Coxiella burnetii by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Coxiella burnetii in a culture.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Coxiella burnetii;  

LOINC Search: 'Coxiella burnetii (culture OR isolate)'),(Exclusion Criteria: none)

concept.display: Coxiella burnetii [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
